channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- YARPP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- YARPP

item.title: CVE-2023-0579|2023-08-16T11:03:21.175Z -- unknown -- yarpp
item.description: The YARPP WordPress plugin before 5.30.3 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before using them in SQL statement/s, which could allow any authenticated users, such as subscribers to perform SQL Injection attacks.
